Machine Learning Engineer NLP
BrightAI Labs Vancouver, BC

Responsibilities:
- Build NLP models for text classification and entity extraction
- Work with HuggingFace Transformers and PyTorch
- Deploy models into production using ONNX Runtime
- Evaluate and optimize model performance

full_text_snippet:
Machine Learning Engineer NLP 
BrightAI Labs Vancouver, BC

Responsibilities:
- Build NLP models for text classification and entity extraction
- Work with HuggingFace Transformers and PyTorch
- Deploy models into production using ONNX Runtime
- Evaluate and optimize model performance

Required Skills:
- Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow
- Transformers, NLP pipelines
- Docker, Git

Preferred:
- ONNX optimization experience
- Experience with LLM fine-tuning
